page.title: 14Margam Park. Events
page.content: Visitor figures for 1985 are approx- imately 175,000, the largest event, Jamboree Cymru. Other major events held include: the Oxfam Big Day Out, organised to raise funds for the Ethiopian Famine Appeal Fund, Festiv- als of Transport and Outdoor Sports and the South Wales Game and Country Fair. Twelve thousand children from West Glamorgan schools visit the park on a daily basis, Twyn yr Hydd House providing a base for Environmental studies and Outdoor Pursuits. Early in 1985, Margam Park emerged as one of the favourite sites for an 80 million pound miniature Disneyland project that would create 1,000 jobs and bring an estimated 3 million extra visitors to the county. Two hundred acres at the east end of the park would have been needed for the project which aroused much local opposition.
